page_strings.dcp_assignment_string: From here you can choose what type of calculations you want to send off to other worker nodes
page_strings.dcp_worker_string: From here you can choose how you set up worker nodes to gain credits on the network
page_strings.assign_action: DCP: Start a new job to be distributed
page_strings.assign_action_desc: Select the following parameters to be added to this new job:
page_strings.worker_action: DCP: Start new worker node(s) to be used by others
page_strings.worker_action_desc: Giving back to the community by creating the following parameters:
